content:
I am a music enthusiast and I want to know the top music charts. Could you provide me with the Hot 100 chart information?
Begin!

The user has requested information on the Hot 100 music chart. My plan is to obtain the chart data for the latest available date using the Hot 100 chart function. Afterwards, I can attempt to give out digestible findings to the user.

Now I will move to retrieve the latest available chart data.

name: hot_100_for_billboard
